sentences.sContent: The book gives an admirably succinct account of the technology and its history.
sentences.sCn: 这本书对该项技术及其历史作了极其简明的叙述。

remMethod.val: suc(下面) + cinct(＝gird束起) → 原指把下面的衣服束起来方便干活 → 简洁的

trans.tranCn: 简洁的, 紧身的, 压缩在小范围内的
trans.tranOther: Something that is succinct expresses facts or ideas clearly and in few words
